xml.name: configfile_circos_conf
xml.configfile:
<<include colors_fonts_patterns.conf>> <<include housekeeping.conf>>
<colors> <<include karyotype-colors.conf>> </colors>
karyotype = karyotype.txt
<image> <<include etc/image.conf>> </image>
<<include ticks.conf>> <<include ideogram.conf>> <plots> <<include 2d.conf>> </plots> <links> <<include links.conf>> </links>

xml.name: configfile_ticks_conf
xml.configfile:
show_ticks = ${ticks.show_ticks} show_tick_labels = yes
#def circosColor($value) #set $value = str($value) #set $r = int($value[1:3], 16) #set $g = int($value[3:5], 16) #set $b = int($value[5:], 16) $r, $g, $b #end def
<ticks> radius = ${ticks.radius}r color = black thickness = 2p multiplier = ${ticks.multiplier}
#for $tick_group in $ticks.tick_group: <tick> spacing = ${tick_group.spacing} size = ${tick_group.size}p show_label = ${tick_group.ticks.show_tick_labels} color = $circosColor($tick_group.color)
#if str($tick_group.ticks.show_tick_labels) == 'yes': label_size = ${tick_group.ticks.label_size}p label_offset = ${tick_group.ticks.label_offset}p format = ${tick_group.ticks.format} kb #end if
## TODO: figure out automated tick labels ##if ${ticks.multiplier} * ${tick_group.spacing} </tick> #end for </ticks>

xml.name: configfile_ideogram_conf
xml.configfile:
<ideogram> <spacing> ## spacing between ideograms default = ${ideogram.spacing}r </spacing>
# ideogram position, thickness and fill radius = ${ideogram.radius}r thickness = ${ideogram.thickness}p fill = yes
show_label = ${ideogram.ideogram_labels.show_label} label_radius = dims(ideogram,radius) + 0.075r label_size = 24 label_parallel = ${ideogram.ideogram_labels.parallel}
show_bands = ${ideogram.bands.show_bands} fill_bands = ${ideogram.bands.fill_bands} #if int($ideogram.bands.band_transparency) > 0: band_transparency = ${ideogram.bands.band_transparency} #end if </ideogram>
